law.catch_line: In Harford County, notwithstanding any other provisions in this subtitle, (a) the Liquor Control Boa...
law.text: In Harford County, notwithstanding any other provisions in this subtitle, (a) the Liquor Control Board may elect to have any appeal tried before a jury; and (b) in the case of an appeal where the license has been suspended or revoked by the Board, the Board may permit the applicant or licensee to operate pending the appeal.
